metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0512 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Divide By Zero in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.1247.

notes.Note: ccdm94> the function containing the vulnerable code was introduced by commit 2fbabd238a (vim version 9.0.0734).

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
